General.Name: Nevada King Gold Corp
General.Description: Nevada King Gold Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of resource properties in Nevada, the United States. The company explores for gold, silver, iron ore, vanadium, and other base metals. The company was formerly known as Victory Metals Inc. and changed its name to Nevada King Gold Corp in April 2021. Nevada King Gold Corp. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 885 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3E8
